about_the_game:
ΔV: Deep Weeb is the long-awaited cosmetic DLC for ΔV: Rings of Saturn that adds a whole new level of personality to your gameplay experience. This DLC transforms all crew portraits into anime characters, giving your space adventure a unique and immersive twist.

Compatibility

All saves are fully forward and backwards compatible. You can install and uninstall this DLC at any time and continue your game in the universe of your choice.

NSWR warning

Frequent instances of NTR and NTER, implied HET and unlockable PDT.
detailed_description:
ΔV: Deep Weeb is the long-awaited cosmetic DLC for ΔV: Rings of Saturn that adds a whole new level of personality to your gameplay experience. This DLC transforms all crew portraits into anime characters, giving your space adventure a unique and immersive twist.

Compatibility

All saves are fully forward and backwards compatible. You can install and uninstall this DLC at any time and continue your game in the universe of your choice.

NSWR warning

Frequent instances of NTR and NTER, implied HET and unlockable PDT.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: i3 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 730 2GB VRAM or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Try running the demo to verify if your system can handle it
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Check the demo for performance - it is identical to full game build.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel, M1 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Try running the demo to verify if your system can handle it
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Check the demo for performance - it is identical to full game build.

short_description: Transforms all crew portraits into beloved anime characters, adding a new level of personality and immersion to your space adventure.
supported_languages: English, Polish, Simplified Chinese, German, Traditional Chinese, French, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Norwegian, Russian, Czech, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Ukrainian, Hungarian
